overview: UP and coming Abella Danger, X-Biz and AVN's Best New Starlet of 2016, puts her best performances up against the popular AJ Applegate, who was the XRCO's Best New Starlet of 2014 in this unforgettable match-up compilation that keeps on cumming! There's no denying these award-winning girls have the talent to easily fill up a double disc set with premium clips from films that feature mind-blowing anal, lingerie, gangbang and more, including two scenes from the acclaimed fetish film series, Shades of Scarlet.
title: Abella Danger VS. AJ Applegate
